title: Kirk Minihane Details His Old Employers Ratings Trouble, Blind Mike Is A Marketing Genius And The Minifan World Was Hacked
description:
Kirk Minihane felt compelled to address the dramatic ratings drop of his old employer. He turned over the marketing keys to Blind Mike for the his upcoming Barstool Gold AMA, Mike revisits Hour 2 of the Michelle Carter Documentary, Angry Bagel Guy Has More Videos Out There And A Minifan Crosses a Line.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
